capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is a great example of a strong and intelligent female character in literature. I've always admired her determination and resourcefulness, especially in the Harry Potter series by J.K. Rowling. She's definitely one of my favorite characters!

Hermione is a great role model, you know? I mean, she's so intelligent and resourceful. As a woman in the wizarding world, it's impressive that she's able to hold her own against guys like Harry and Ron. I think her determination and quick thinking really make her stand out.
